sentences.sContent: As a sophomore, I feel that the time flies.
sentences.sContent_eng: As a sophomore, I feel that the time flies.
sentences.sCn: 作为一个大二学生，我觉得光阴似箭。

sentences.sContent: When my son was a hign-school sophomore, he got a part-time job sacking groceries at a supermarket. He came home all smiles.
sentences.sContent_eng: When my son was a hign-school sophomore, he got a part-time job sacking groceries at a supermarket. He came home all smiles.
sentences.sCn: 我儿子在一所中学读二年级时，在一家超级市场找到了一份包装商品的业余工作。他满面笑容地回到了家。 。

sentences.sContent: In his first week as a sophomore, he built CourseMatch, a program that enabled users to figure out which classes to take based on the choices of other students.
sentences.sContent_eng: In his first week as a sophomore, he built CourseMatch, a program that enabled users to figure out which classes to take based on the choices of other students.
sentences.sCn: 在大学二年级的头一个星期，他就编写了一个名叫“课程搭配”的程序，它可以让用户根据其他学生的选课情况来给自己选课。

remMethod.val: “舒服么”→大二还是比较清闲、 舒服的→(大学)二年级学生

words.tran: 复杂的；精致的；久经世故的；富有经验的
使变得世故；使迷惑；篡改（sophisticate的过去分词形式）

trans.tranOther: a student who is in their second year of study at a college or  high school
